Street Rod Nationals a hit in Gisborne city centre; polo teams compete https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/sport/street-rod-nationals-a-hit-in-gisborne-city-centre-polo-teams-compete/J4CZSYPVSVFSFFJAXEMHQL2MT4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/sport/street-rod-nationals-a-hit-in-gisborne-city-centre-polo-teams-compete/J4CZSYPVSVFSFFJAXEMHQL2MT4/ Chris TaewaHot rod and custom car Show N Shine had the city centre abuzz on Saturday. Mon, 20 Jan 2025 01:32:55 +0000 This stunning 1951 Studebaker Starlite Coupe drew plenty of interest at the Street Rods Nationals Show N Shine on Saturday. Cars were crammed into the block between Grey St and Palmerston Rd and the public turned out in big numbers to admire the vehicles and talk with their passionate owners.
